basics.name: Owen Josse

work.company: CERMICS, Ecole Nationale des Ponts et Chaussées
highlights: Co-evolution of Dynamic Graphs and Graphons : graphon-valued processes
Weak solutions of fractional SPDEs for stochastic optimization problems

work.company: Société des Grands Projets (formerly Société du Grand Paris)
